D

debug - Static variable in class client.GeoClient
 
demoClient - package demoClient
The package demoClient contains all the clients we use in the demo (30/01/2014) of the code and the demoUtilities class to draw bus stations from Toulouse.
DemoUtilities - Class in demoClient
This class helps to display the bus stations from Toulouse in the map, using the local file "txt/listBusStations.txt" that contains a list of bus stations from Toulouse and their Coordinates.
DemoUtilities() - Constructor for class demoClient.DemoUtilities
 
displayArea() - Method in class xmlElements.osm
Test Method to check if the list of nodes obtained is empty or not.
displayGeoScalePath() - Method in class xmlElements.GeoScalePath
The displayGeoScalePath method simply displays the GeoScalePath in the console.
DisplayMap - Class in jMapViewer
DisplayMap is the Java class which displays the map for the user.
DisplayMap() - Constructor for class jMapViewer.DisplayMap
Constructor
drawAllBusStations(DisplayMap) - Static method in class demoClient.DemoUtilities
Display all the bus stations referenced in the local file "txt/listBusStations.txt" on the DisplayMap given in argument
drawArea(String, Color, Color, List<Coordinate>) - Method in class jMapViewer.DisplayMap
This method permits to draw an area on the map, and to add it to the layerAreas layer.
drawCircle(String, Color, Color, double, double, double) - Method in class jMapViewer.DisplayMap
This method permits to draw a circle on the map, and to add it to the layerCircles layer.
drawPoint(String, Color, double, double) - Method in class jMapViewer.DisplayMap
This method permits to add a dot to the map, and to add it to the layerPoints layer.
drawToulouseSuburb(int, int, Color, Color) - Method in class jMapViewer.DisplayMap
This method draw a Toulouse suburb on the map (using the OverPass API)
